title: Springfield Armory National Historic Site: Safety
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Safety            Safety        Springfield Armory National Historic Site is located in an urban environment in downtown Springfield, Massachusets and on the campus of Springfield Technical Community College.  Please be aware of your surroundings at all times.  Police, fire, and rescue services are provided by the city of Springfield.  If an emergency occurs while you are visiting the park you can report the incident to the park ranger in the visitor center, or call 911 directly for assistance.
